measured_by: firing rates of dorsal anterior cingulate cortex neurons
justification: "Research using the stay-switch framework has shown that firing rates of neurons in monkey dACC positively correlate with decisions to leave a patch (option disengagement)."

measured_by: neuron activity in dorsal anterior cingulate cortex
justification: "Research using the accept-reject framework has shown that neurons in monkey dACC encode the time cost associated with choosing an option (option engagement)."

topic_or_construct: Value of searching for alternative options
measured_by: BOLD activity in dorsal anterior cingulate cortex
justification: "Studies comparing accept-reject choices with economic ones have shown that BOLD activity in the dACC is positively correlated with the value of searching for alternative options."

measured_by: BOLD activity in ventromedial prefrontal cortex
justification: "vmPFC activity is positively correlated with the chosen option's reward magnitude during binary economic choices."
